scripts.start: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run start:close " " cd services/event && npm run start:close " " cd services/messenger && npm run start:close " " cd services/shorts && npm run start:close " " cd services/user && npm run start:close " " cd services/host && npm run start "
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run start " " cd services/event && npm run start " " cd services/messenger && npm run start " " cd services/shorts && npm run start " " cd services/user && npm run start " " cd services/host && npm run start "
scripts.build:dev: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run build:dev " " cd services/event && npm run build:dev " " cd services/messenger && npm run build:dev " " cd services/shorts && npm run build:dev " " cd services/user && npm run build:dev " " cd services/host && npm run build:dev "
scripts.build:relize: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run build:relize " " cd services/event && npm run build:relize " " cd services/messenger && npm run build:relize " " cd services/shorts && npm run build:relize " " cd services/user && npm run build:relize " " cd services/host && npm run build:relize "
scripts.build:relize:analyzer: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run build:relize:analyzer " " cd services/event && npm run build:relize:analyzer " " cd services/messenger && npm run build:relize:analyzer " " cd services/shorts && npm run build:relize:analyzer " " cd services/user && npm run build:relize:analyzer " " cd services/host && npm run build:relize:analyzer "
scripts.build:mobile: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run build:mobile " " cd services/event && npm run build:mobile " " cd services/messenger && npm run build:mobile " " cd services/shorts && npm run build:mobile " " cd services/user && npm run build:mobile " " cd services/host && npm run build:mobile "
scripts.build:desktop: concurrently "cd services/about && npm run build:desktop " " cd services/event && npm run build:desktop " " cd services/messenger && npm run build:desktop " " cd services/shorts && npm run build:desktop " " cd services/user && npm run build:desktop " " cd services/host && npm run build:desktop "
